buginformation.summary: arbitrary remote code execution with invoker transformer
buginformation.description: with invokertransformer serializable collections can build that execute arbitrary java code sun reflect annotation annotationinvocationhandler readobject invokes entryset and get deserialized collection you have endpoint that accepts serialized java objects jmx rmi remote ejb you can combine the two create arbitrary remote code execution vulnerability don know good fix short removing invokertransformer making not serializable both probably break existing applications this not research but has been discovered other people https github com frohoff ysoserial http foxglovesecurity com 2015 what weblogic websphere jboss jenkins opennms and your application have common this vulnerability
